60° Current weather TODAY | 60°F Partly cloudy. Patchy fog in the morning. Highs 74 to 79 near the coast to 88 to 93 inland. Light winds. Hourly Detailed Radar FRI 93° 65° SAT 91° 63° SUN 88° 60° MON 88° 58° TUE 87° 59° WED 84° --° Admin

Wienerschnitzel Rate this business 20652 Lake Forest Dr Lake Forest , CA 92630 | Get Directions »
949-583-1508
www.​wienerschnitzel.​com 33.662541 -117.667282 primary Wienerschnitzel 20652 Lake Forest Dr, Lake Forest, CA 949-583-1508 /listings/wienerschnitzel-33 1593034 /locations/1950065 Email Send to Phone Print Tweet ‹ Back to Listing new Embed | Share context Photos (5) Photos Credit 0Alex Gonzales Credit 0Alex Gonzales Credit 0Alex Gonzales Credit 0Alex Gonzales Credit 0Alex Gonzales Upload Photos | Search Patch Archive http://lakeforest-ca.patch.com/listings/wienerschnitzel-33/media_attachments/edit?upload_started=1342045482 asset[new_asset_attachment_attributes][to_id] 1593034 asset[new_asset_attachment_attributes][to_type] Listing listing[new_asset_attachment_attributes][user_id] new_asset_attachment_attributes
Do you own or manage this location? Claim it! Wienerschnitzel is a fast-food restaurant that offers premium hot dogs and sausages. Its menu includes hot dogs, chili dogs, burgers and chili-cheese fries. You can choose between single servings of meat or try one of the combos that add value to your meal. For dessert, you can try an cream cone or Freezes, featuring the Nutter Butter. This location has a large interior with plenty of seating for customers.
Hours: Mon-Fri, 7am - 10pm; Sat, Sun, 9am - 10pm Handicap Accessible: Yes Founding Date: 1961 Payments accepted: American Express, Cash, Debit Card, Discover, MasterCard, Visa Products: Burgers, fries, hot dogs, shakes General services: Eat-in, Take-out Menu link: www.​wienerschnitzel.​com/​menu_wienerschnitzel.​php Specialties: Hot dogs, sausages ATM: No Parking: Free lot Private events: No Cuisine: American, Burgers, Polish What dish is most representative of the restaurant?: Chili-cheese dog Price level: $ Reservations: Not accepted Number of tables: 25 Features: Dinner, Kids' Menu, Lunch Atmosphere: Fun, Late-night, Singles scene Dress code: Casual
